entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
